titleStmt.title: The death of good Josiah lamented a sermon occasioned by the death of our late most gracious soveraign Queen Mary, of ever blessed memory, preach'd at Balsham in Cambridgshire, March 3, 1695 / Joseph Powell ...
titleStmt.author: Powell, Joseph, d. 1698.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"Some books printed for, and sold by Thomas Speech, at the Three Crowns near the Royal Exchange in Cornhil, 1695." : p. [1]-[2] at end.
